heading: Today:
text: Some patchy fog early. Sun, mixing with some clouds. More clouds in the St. Lawrence Valley and northern NY, with a rising chance of afternoon showers. Highs in the low to mid 70s, upper 60s over the higher terrain north. Winds light, becoming south and increasing to 10 mph east of the Green Mountains, and 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph from the Green Mountains west.

heading: Tonight:
text: Showers becoming likely through NY and the St. Lawrence Valley, spreading east into VT after midnight. Mainly dry east of the Green Mountains into NH. Lows in the upper 40s to low 50s. Winds south near 10 mph, diminishing to light in sheltered valleys.

heading: Friday:
text: Showers, becoming scattered through NY, more numerous from VT east. Some breaks of sun west late. Cooler. Highs in the 60s to near 70, some upper 50s in the Adirondacks. Winds south to southwest near 10 mph.
